RESEARCH PROJECTS
WORKING ARTIFACTS.

> CAPABILITY: Readiness Decision Support Tools

Working artifacts and structured notes that connect support data to readiness decisions.

Focus areas include uncertainty, sparse data, and field constraints in defense sustainment.

Operational Modules

Smart Triage Architecture

A holistic Decision Support Ecosystem that orchestrates the critical link between Spare Parts Supply Chain and Maintenance Operations. It uses an analytical suite to optimize sustainment, balancing inventory costs against Operational Availability (Ao) targets.

UNCERTAINTY-AWARE OPTIMIZATION READINESS DECISIONS
AI-Driven Demand Forecasting

Forecasting intermittent & lumpy demand requires a versatile approach. This module deploys a hybrid modeling strategy (Deep Learning + Probabilistic) to detect complex sparse patterns where standard averages fail.

SPARSE DEMAND PROBABILISTIC AUDIT-READY
Semantic Data Standardization

Field technicians speak in "jargon", not standards. This hybrid engine uses Regex & Local Models (Guardrailed) to convert unstructured maintenance logs into structured datasets, validated with deterministic checks for auditability.

THE DATA BRIDGE NLP / VALIDATION INTEROPERABILITY
Legacy Integration Layer

A custom workflow layer designed to augment legacy ERP infrastructure. It bridges rigid ERP protocols with dynamic operational needs, automating logistical data processing into decision workflows.

LEGACY INTEGRATION DECISION WORKFLOWS THE DATA BRIDGE
RESEARCH_MODE: ACTIVE

Open to academic collaboration on readiness decision support for ILS/IPS sustainment.
